ygData.subject: Re: Hammer of Wrath
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I believe its the same one you get as a cleric at lvl 9 and I was able to hunt willow wisps with mine as a cleric but I haven t reached 15th yet to know.
ygData.messageBody:
Well I believe its the same one you get as a cleric at lvl 9 and I was able
to hunt willow wisps with mine as a cleric but I haven't reached 15th yet to
know.
Silvermyst

> -----Original Message-----
> From: billy_kendall@... [SMTP:billy_kendall@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 10:19 AM
> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqpaladin] Hammer of Wrath
>
> From: billy_kendall@...
>
> I have a question concerning the Hammer of Wrath. I just obtained 15th
> level and the Hammer of Wrath spell. Now when i summon this thing and
> then have it in my possesion I can right click it and it says that it is a
> MAGIC ITEM, but I went to Befallen last night and when I tried to hit an
> Ice Boned Skeleton with it, it said that the skele was invulnerable! I
> thought that I would be able to hit creatures that were only susceptible
> to magic attack with this hammer, you know, things like Willow Wisps and
> the such? Does anyone know what the deal is with this?
>
